posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Uzit (Leifield SGC 40), Broadleaf 350 (Maddox, SGC 20)
posts.post_content:
PM or [URL="mikefrohme@yahoo.com"]email me[/URL] if you're interested in either card or want to make an offer - initial asking price assumes Paypal "payment owed" and includes shipping, insurance.

Click on images below for full size scans, or see the Sale/Trade link in the signature for these and other T cards and more.
